dontPress:
Careful! 
 Don't press the button if you don't know the answer
leaveDescription: Are you sure you want to leave the quiz?
lobbyView.title: Waiting for the quiz to start...
endedView.title: The quiz has ended, thank you for playing!

answeredQuotes.0: You’re fast! But are you right? 🤞
answeredQuotes.1: Well, that was fast. But was it right? 🤔
answeredQuotes.2: Speed isn’t everything... unless it’s wrong. 😅
answeredQuotes.3: Quick answer! Let's hope it's not a quick mistake. 😏
answeredQuotes.4: Are you confident, or just really fast? 🏎️
answeredQuotes.5: Fast answer, bold move! Let’s see if it pays off. 🧐
answeredQuotes.7: That was speedy! But was it... considered? 🕵️
answeredQuotes.8: You might have set a record for speed—accuracy, though? We'll see! 🕐
answeredQuotes.9: Sometimes the first thought is the best—sometimes it’s not. 😇
answeredQuotes.10: A quick answer is exciting, but accuracy is thrilling. 🎢
answeredQuotes.11: Let’s hope your guess was as good as your speed. 🎯
answeredQuotes.13: You didn’t even let your brain catch up. Respect. Kinda. 😏
answeredQuotes.14: Fast fingers, fast mind? We’ll find out! 🧠
answeredQuotes.15: Quick answer! But was it a quick decision? 🤔

insperationalQuotes.0: Failure isn't the end—it's just the beginning. 💥
insperationalQuotes.1: Even the brightest minds stumble. Don’t be afraid to fail. 💡
insperationalQuotes.2: Mistakes aren’t failures, they’re fuel for your fire. 🔥
insperationalQuotes.3: Perseverance isn’t just about winning; it’s about proving them wrong. 😈
insperationalQuotes.4: One misstep won’t define you—your comeback will. 💪
insperationalQuotes.5: Success is built on the ruins of failure. Rise from the ashes. 🔥
insperationalQuotes.6: Falling is easy. Getting back up? That’s where you become unstoppable. ⚡
insperationalQuotes.7: You've got to get back to the grind-set mindset 😈

noStreakLost.0: At least you didn't have a streak to loose! 🤗
noStreakLost.1: No streak lost, no streak gained. 🤷
